revised_title: Further Analysis of Black Body Radiation Formula
tldr: The author presents a new approach to understanding black body radiation, proposing a formula that closely matches experimental data. The formula suggests that the primary disturbance required for this energy distribution is a solution of the equation expressing the motion of an aperiodic dynamical system. The author also compares their formula with Planck's formula and finds that they agree to within 3% for total radiation.
